member.name: T:EsgynDB.Data.EsgynDBCommand
member.summary: Represents a SQL statement or stored procedure to execute against a EsgynDB database. This class cannot be inherited.

member.name: M:EsgynDB.Data.EsgynDBCommand.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the EsgyndbCommand class.

member.name: M:EsgynDB.Data.EsgynDBCommand.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the EsgyndbCommand class with the text of the query.

member.name: M:EsgynDB.Data.EsgynDBCommand.#ctor(System.String,EsgynDB.Data.EsgynDBConnection)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the EsgyndbCommand class with the text of the query and a EsgynDBConnection.
member.param: A EsgynDBConnection to associate with this command.

member.name: M:EsgynDB.Data.EsgynDBCommand.#ctor(System.String,EsgynDB.Data.EsgynDBConnection,EsgynDB.Data.EsgynDBTransaction)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the EsgyndbCommand class with the text of the query, a EsgynDBConnection, and the EsgynDBTransaction.
member.param: A EsgynDBConnection to associate with this command.
Not used. The EsgynDBTransaction associated with the Command will always be referenced from the EsgynDBConnection object.

member.name: M:EsgynDB.Data.EsgynDBCommand.#ctor(System.String,EsgynDB.Data.EsgynDBConnection,EsgynDB.Data.EsgynDBTransaction,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the EsgyndbCommand class with the text of the query, a EsgynDBConnection, a EsgynDBTransaction, and a command label.
member.param: A EsgynDBConnection to associate with this command.
Not used. The EsgynDBTransaction associated with the Command will always be referenced from the EsgynDBConnection object.
The label to be associated with the EsgyndbCommand.

member.returns: The first column of the first row in the result set or a null reference if the result set is empty.

member.name: T:EsgynDB.Data.EsgynDBCommandBuilder
member.summary: Automatically generates single-table commands that are used to reconcile changes made to a DataSet with the associated EsgynDB database. This class cannot be inherited.

member.name: M:EsgynDB.Data.EsgynDBCommandBuilder.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the EsgynDBCommandBuilder class.

member.name: M:EsgynDB.Data.EsgynDBCommandBuilder.#ctor(EsgynDB.Data.EsgynDBDataAdapter)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the EsgynDBCommandBuilder class with the associated EsgynDBDataAdapter object.
member.param: The EsgynDBDataAdapter to associate with this EsgynDBCommandBuilder

member.name: M:EsgynDB.Data.EsgynDBCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand
member.summary: Gets the automatically generated EsgyndbCommand object required to perform deletions on the database.
member.returns: The automatically generated EsgyndbCommand object required to perform deletions.

member.name: M:EsgynDB.Data.EsgynDBCommandBuilder.GetUpdateCommand
member.summary: Gets the automatically generated EsgyndbCommand object required to perform updates on the database.
member.returns: The automatically generated EsgyndbCommand object required to perform updates.

member.name: M:EsgynDB.Data.EsgynDBCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand
member.summary: Gets the automatically generated EsgyndbCommand object required to perform inserts on the database.
member.returns: The automatically generated EsgyndbCommand object required to perform inserts.

member.name: M:EsgynDB.Data.EsgynDBCommandBuilder.UnquoteIdentifier(System.String)
member.summary: Given a quoted identifier, returns the correct unquoted form of that identifier. This includes correctly unescaping any embedded quotes in the identifier.
member.param: The identifier that will have its embedded quotes removed.
member.returns: The unquoted identifier, with embedded quotes properly unescaped.

member.name: M:EsgynDB.Data.EsgynDBCommandBuilder.ApplyParameterInfo(System.Data.Common.DbParameter,System.Data.DataRow,System.Data.StatementType,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Allows the provider implementation of the DbCommandBuilder class to handle additional parameter properties.
member.param: A DbParameter to which the additional modifications are applied.
The DataRow from the schema table provided by GetSchemaTable.
The type of command being generated; INSERT, UPDATE or DELETE.
true if the parameter is part of the update or delete WHERE clause, false if it is part of the insert or update values.

member.name: M:EsgynDB.Data.EsgynDBCommandBuilder.GetParameterName(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the full parameter name, given the partial parameter name.
member.param: The partial name of the parameter.
member.returns: The full parameter name corresponding to the partial parameter name requested.

member.name: M:EsgynDB.Data.EsgynDBCommandBuilder.GetParameterName(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns the name of the specified parameter.
member.param: The number to be included as part of the parameter's name.
member.returns: The name of the parameter with the specified number appended as part of the parameter name.

member.name: M:EsgynDB.Data.EsgynDBCommandBuilder.GetParameterPlaceholder(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns the placeholder for the parameter in the associated SQL statement.
member.param: The number to be included as part of the parameter's name.
member.returns: The name of the parameter with the specified number appended.

member.name: M:EsgynDB.Data.EsgynDBCommandBuilder.SetRowUpdatingHandler(System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter)
member.summary: Registers the EsgynDBCommandBuilder to handle the RowUpdating event for a DbDataAdapter.
member.param: The DbDataAdapter to be used for the update.

member.summary: Gets or sets a EsgynDBDataAdapter object for which SQL statements are automatically generated.

member.summary: Retrieves metadata information without restrictions based on the collectionName provided. Valid collections can be obtained by using "MetaDataCollections" as the collection name
member.returns: A DataTable containing the metadata requested.

member.summary: Retrieves metadata information based on the collectionName and restrictions provided. Valid collections can be obtained by using "MetaDataCollections" as the collection name
member.returns: A DataTable containing the metadata requested.

member.name: E:EsgynDB.Data.EsgynDBDataAdapter.RowUpdating

member.name: E:EsgynDB.Data.EsgynDBDataAdapter.RowUpdated
member.summary: Occurs during Update after a command is executed against the data source. The attempt to update is made, so the event fires.

member.summary: Datetime range.

member.summary: Signed numeric stored in binary form.

member.summary: Unsigned numeric stored in binary form.

member.name: F:EsgynDB.Data.EsgynDBType.SmallIntUnsigned

member.summary: 32 bit signed integer.

member.summary: 32 bit unsigned integer.

member.summary: Signed numeric stored in character form.

member.summary: Unsigned numeric stored in character form.

member.summary: Approximate numeric stored as an IEEE Float.

member.summary: Approximate numeric stored with 23 bits of precision and 8 bits of exponent.

member.summary: Approximate numeric stored as an IEEE Double Precision

member.name: F:EsgynDB.Data.EsgynDBType.NVarchar

member.name: T:EsgynDB.Data.EsgynDBParameterCollection
member.summary: Represents a collection of parameters associated with a EsgyndbCommand and their respective mappings to columns in a DataSet. This class cannot be inherited.

member.name: M:EsgynDB.Data.EsgynDBParameterCollection.Add(System.Object)
member.summary: Adds the specified EsgynDBParameter object to the EsgynDBParameterCollection.
member.param: The EsgynDBParameter to add to the collection.
member.returns: The index of the new EsgynDBParameter object.
member.exception: The parameter passed was not a EsgynDBParameter.
The value parameter is null.

member.name: M:EsgynDB.Data.EsgynDBParameterCollection.AddRange(System.Array)
member.summary: Adds an Enumerable Collection of EsgynDBParameter objects to the end of the EsgynDBParameterCollection.
member.param: The Enumerable Collection of EsgynDBParameter objects to add.
member.exception: The parameter passed was not an Enumerable Collection of EsgynDBParameter objects.
The values parameter is null.

member.name: M:EsgynDB.Data.EsgynDBParameterCollection.Clear
member.summary: Removes all the EsgynDBParameter objects from the EsgynDBParameterCollection.

member.name: M:EsgynDB.Data.EsgynDBParameterCollection.Contains(System.String)
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether a EsgynDBParameter in this EsgynDBParameterCollection has the specified name.
member.returns: true if the EsygndbbParameterCollections contains the EsgynDBParameter; otherwise false.

member.name: M:EsgynDB.Data.EsgynDBParameterCollection.Contains(System.Object)
member.summary: Determines whether the specified EsgynDBParameter is in this EsgynDBParameterCollection.
member.returns: true if the EsygndbbParameterCollections contains the EsgynDBParameter; otherwise false.
member.exception: The parameter passed was not a EsgynDBParameter.

member.name: M:EsgynDB.Data.EsgynDBParameterCollection.CopyTo(System.Array,System.Int32)
member.summary: Copies all the elements of the current EsgynDBParameterCollection to the specified EsgynDBParameterCollection starting at the specified destination index.
member.param: The EsgynDBParameterCollection that is the destination of the elements copied from the current EsgynDBParameterCollection.
A 32-bit integer that represents the index in the EsgynDBParameterCollection at which copying starts.
member.exception: The parameter passed was not a EsgynDBParameterCollection.

member.name: M:EsgynDB.Data.EsgynDBParameterCollection.GetEnumerator
member.summary: Returns an enumerator that iterates through the EsgynDBParameterCollection.
member.returns: An IEnumerator for the EsgynDBParameterCollection.

member.name: M:EsgynDB.Data.EsgynDBParameterCollection.IndexOf(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the location of the specified EsgynDBParameter with the specified name.
member.param: The case-sensitive name of the EsgynDBParameter to find.
member.returns: The zero-based location of the specified EsgynDBParameter with the specified case-sensitive name. Returns -1 when the object does not exist in the EsgynDBParameterCollection.

member.name: M:EsgynDB.Data.EsgynDBParameterCollection.IndexOf(System.Object)
member.summary: Gets the location of the specified EsgynDBParameter within the collection.
member.returns: The zero-based location of the specified EsgynDBParameter that is a EsgynDBParameter within the collection. Returns -1 when the object does not exist in the EsgynDBParameterCollection.
member.exception: The parameter passed was not a EsgynDBParameter.

member.name: M:EsgynDB.Data.EsgynDBParameterCollection.Insert(System.Int32,System.Object)
member.summary: Inserts a EsgynDBParameter object into the EsgynDBParameterCollection at the specified index.
member.param: The zero-based index at which value should be inserted.
A EsgynDBParameter object to be inserted in the EsgynDBParameterCollection.
member.exception: The parameter passed was not a EsgynDBParameter.

member.name: M:EsgynDB.Data.EsgynDBParameterCollection.Remove(System.Object)
member.summary: Removes the specified EsgynDBParameter from the collection.
member.param: A EsgynDBParameter object to remove from the collection.
member.exception: The parameter passed was not a EsgynDBParameter.

member.name: M:EsgynDB.Data.EsgynDBParameterCollection.RemoveAt(System.String)
member.summary: Removes the EsgynDBParameter from the EsgynDBParameterCollection at the specified parameter name.
member.param: The name of the EsgynDBParameter to remove.
member.exception: The specified index does not exist.

member.name: M:EsgynDB.Data.EsgynDBParameterCollection.RemoveAt(System.Int32)
member.summary: Removes the EsgynDBParameter from the EsgynDBParameterCollection at the specified index.
member.param: The zero-based index of the EsgynDBParameter object to remove.
member.exception: The specified index does not exist.

member.returns: The DbParameter the object with the specified name.

member.summary: Returns the DbParameter object at the specified index in the collection.

member.returns: The DbParameter object at the specified index in the collection.

member.summary: Sets the DbParameter object with the specified name to a new value.

member.summary: Sets the DbParameter object at the specified index to a new value.
member.param: The index where the DbParameter object is located.

member.summary: Returns an Integer that contains the number of elements in the EsgynDBParameterCollection. Read-only.

members.member:
Represents a set of methods for creating instances of the HP.Data provider's implementation of the data source classes.
//[Guid("18E26E64-50F9-4ba3-8530-DBBD117B1DCD")]

member.name: F:EsgynDB.Data.EsgynDBFactory.Instance
member.summary: Gets an instance of the EsgynDBFactory. This can be used to retrieve strongly typed data objects.

member.name: M:EsgynDB.Data.EsgynDBFactory.CreateCommand
member.summary: Creates a new EsgyndbCommand object.
member.returns: A new EsgyndbCommand object.

member.name: M:EsgynDB.Data.EsgynDBFactory.CreateCommandBuilder
member.summary: Creates a new EsgynDBCommandBuilder object.
member.returns: A new EsgynDBCommandBuilder object.

member.name: M:EsgynDB.Data.EsgynDBFactory.CreateConnection
member.summary: Creates a new EsgynDBConnection object.
member.returns: A new EsgynDBConnection object.

member.name: M:EsgynDB.Data.EsgynDBFactory.CreateConnectionStringBuilder
member.summary: Creates a new EsgynDBConnectionStringBuilder object.
member.returns: A new EsgynDBConnectionStringBuilder object.

member.name: M:EsgynDB.Data.EsgynDBFactory.CreateDataAdapter
member.summary: Creates a new EsgynDBDataAdapter object.
member.returns: A new EsgynDBDataAdapter object.

member.name: M:EsgynDB.Data.EsgynDBFactory.CreateDataSourceEnumerator
member.summary: Not supported.
member.returns: Not Applicable
member.exception: Always thrown.

member.name: M:EsgynDB.Data.EsgynDBFactory.CreateParameter
member.summary: Creates a new EsgynDBParameter object.
member.returns: A new EsgynDBParameter object.

member.name: P:EsgynDB.Data.EsgynDBFactory.CanCreateDataSourceEnumerator
member.summary: Returns false. CreateDataSourceEnumerator() is not supported

member.name: T:EsgynDB.Data.EsgynDBParameter
member.summary: Represents a parameter to a EsgyndbCommand and optionally its mapping to DataSet columns. This class cannot be inherited.

member.name: M:EsgynDB.Data.EsgynDBParameter.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the EsgynDBParameter class.

member.name: M:EsgynDB.Data.EsgynDBParameter.#ctor(System.String,EsgynDB.Data.EsgynDBType)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the EsgynDBParameter class that uses the parameter name and the data type.
member.param: The name of the parameter to map.
member.exception: The value supplied in the dataType parameter is an invalid back-end data type.

member.name: M:EsgynDB.Data.EsgynDBParameter.#ctor(System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the EsgynDBParameter class that uses the parameter name and a value of the new EsgynDBParameter.
member.param: The name of the parameter to map.
An Object that is the value of the EsgynDBParameter.

member.name: M:EsgynDB.Data.EsgynDBParameter.#ctor(System.String,EsgynDB.Data.EsgynDBType,System.Int32)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the EsgynDBParameter class that uses the parameter name, the EsgynDBType, and the size.
member.param: The name of the parameter to map.
member.exception: The value supplied in the dataType parameter is an invalid back-end data type.

member.name: M:EsgynDB.Data.EsgynDBParameter.#ctor(System.String,EsgynDB.Data.EsgynDBType,System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the EsgynDBParameter class that uses the parameter name, the EsgynDBType, the size, and the source column name.
member.param: The name of the parameter to map.
The name of the source column.
member.exception: The value supplied in the dataType parameter is an invalid back-end data type.

member.name: M:EsgynDB.Data.EsgynDBParameter.#ctor(System.String,EsgynDB.Data.EsgynDBType,System.Int32,System.Data.ParameterDirection,System.Boolean,System.Byte,System.Byte,System.String,System.Data.DataRowVersion,System.Object)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the EsgynDBParameter class that uses the parameter name, the type of the parameter, the size of the parameter, a ParameterDirection, the precision of the parameter, the scale of the parameter, the source column, a DataRowVersion to use, and the value of the parameter.
member.param: The name of the parameter to map.
true if the value of the field can be null; otherwise false.
The total number of digits to the left and right of the decimal point to which Value is resolved.
The total number of decimal places to which Value is resolved.
The name of the source column.
An Object that is the value of the EsgynDBParameter.
member.exception: The value supplied in the dataType parameter is an invalid back-end data type.

member.name: M:EsgynDB.Data.EsgynDBParameter.ResetDbType
member.summary: Resets the type associated with this EsgynDBParameter.

member.name: M:EsgynDB.Data.EsgynDBParameter.ResetEsgynDBType
member.summary: Resets the type associated with this EsgynDBParameter.

member.name: M:EsgynDB.Data.EsgynDBParameter.System#ICloneable#Clone
member.summary: Makes a copy of the EsgynDBParameter.
member.returns: A copy of this EsgynDBParameter object.

member.name: P:EsgynDB.Data.EsgynDBParameter.DbType
member.summary: Gets or sets the DbType of the parameter.

member.name: P:EsgynDB.Data.EsgynDBParameter.Direction
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the parameter is input-only, output-only, or bidirectional parameter.

member.name: P:EsgynDB.Data.EsgynDBParameter.Encoding
member.summary: Gets or sets the encoding of the EsgynDBParameter.

member.name: P:EsgynDB.Data.EsgynDBParameter.IsNullable
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the parameter accepts null values.

member.name: P:EsgynDB.Data.EsgynDBParameter.EsgyndbDbType
member.summary: Gets or sets the EsgynDBType of the parameter.

member.name: P:EsgynDB.Data.EsgynDBParameter.ParameterName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the EsgynDBParameter.

member.name: P:EsgynDB.Data.EsgynDBParameter.Precision
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum number of digits used to represent the Value property.

member.name: P:EsgynDB.Data.EsgynDBParameter.Scale
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of decimal places to which Value is resolved.

member.name: P:EsgynDB.Data.EsgynDBParameter.Signed
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the parameter is signed.

member.name: P:EsgynDB.Data.EsgynDBParameter.Size
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum size, in bytes, of the data within the column.

member.name: P:EsgynDB.Data.EsgynDBParameter.SourceCatalog
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the source catalog mapped to the DataSet and used for loading or returning the Value

member.name: P:EsgynDB.Data.EsgynDBParameter.SourceColumn
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the source column mapped to the DataSet and used for loading or returning the Value

member.name: P:EsgynDB.Data.EsgynDBParameter.SourceColumnNullMapping
member.summary: Always set to false. SourceColumnNullMapping is disabled for proper CommandBuilder and DataAdapter support.

member.name: P:EsgynDB.Data.EsgynDBParameter.Heading
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the source column heading mapped to the DataSet and used for loading or returning the Value

member.name: P:EsgynDB.Data.EsgynDBParameter.SourceSchema
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the source schema mapped to the DataSet and used for loading or returning the Value

member.name: P:EsgynDB.Data.EsgynDBParameter.SourceTable
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the source table mapped to the DataSet and used for loading or returning the Value

member.name: P:EsgynDB.Data.EsgynDBParameter.SourceVersion
member.summary: Gets or sets the DataRowVersion to use when you load Value

member.name: P:EsgynDB.Data.EsgynDBParameter.Value
member.summary: Gets or sets the value of the parameter.

member.summary: Not supported.
member.returns: N/A

member.returns: N/A

member.summary: Returns an IEnumerator that iterates through the EsgynDBDataReader.
member.returns: An IEnumerator for the EsgynDBDataReader.

member.name: M:EsgynDB.Data.EsgynDBDataReader.GetFieldType(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the Type that is the data type of the object
member.returns: The Type that is the data type of the object.

member.summary: Gets the value of the specified column as a single-precision floating point number.

member.summary: Not supported.
member.returns: N/A

member.summary: Gets the value of the specified column as a 16-bit signed integer.

member.name: M:EsgynDB.Data.EsgynDBDataReader.GetName(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the name of the specified column.
member.returns: The name of the specified column.

member.name: M:EsgynDB.Data.EsgynDBDataReader.GetOrdinal(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the column ordinal, given the name of the column.
member.returns: The zero-based column ordinal.

member.name: M:EsgynDB.Data.EsgynDBDataReader.GetSchemaTable
member.summary: Returns a DataTable that describes the column metadata of the EsgynDBDataReader.
member.returns: A DataTable that describes the column metadata.
member.exception: The EsgynDBDataReader is closed.
member.remarks: For the GetSchemaTable method returns metadata about each column in the following order: ColumnName ColumnOrdinal ColumnSize NumericPrecision NumericScale DataType DataTypeName ProviderType ProviderSpecificDataType IsLong AllowDBNull IsUnique IsKey BaseCatalogName BaseSchemaName BaseTableName BaseColumnName

member.name: M:EsgynDB.Data.EsgynDBDataReader.GetString(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the value of the specified column as a string.
member.returns: The value of the specified column.
member.exception: The specified cast is not valid.

member.name: M:EsgynDB.Data.EsgynDBDataReader.GetValue(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the value of the specified column in its native format.
member.returns: The value of the specified column.

member.name: M:EsgynDB.Data.EsgynDBDataReader.GetValues(System.Object[])
member.summary: Populates an array of objects with the column values of the current row.
member.param: An array of Object into which to copy the attribute columns.
member.returns: The number of instances of Object in the array

member.name: M:EsgynDB.Data.EsgynDBDataReader.IsDBNull(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the column contains non-existent or missing values.
member.returns: true if the specified column value is equivalent to DBNull; otherwise false.

member.name: M:EsgynDB.Data.EsgynDBDataReader.NextResult
member.summary: Advances the data reader to the next result.
member.returns: true if there are more result sets; otherwise false.

member.name: M:EsgynDB.Data.EsgynDBDataReader.Read
member.summary: Advances the EsgynDBDataReader to the next record.
member.returns: true if there are more rows; otherwise false.

member.name: P:EsgynDB.Data.EsgynDBDataReader.Depth
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates the depth of nesting for the current row. Always returns 0.

member.name: P:EsgynDB.Data.EsgynDBDataReader.FieldCount
member.summary: Gets the number of columns in the current row.

member.name: P:EsgynDB.Data.EsgynDBDataReader.HasRows
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the EsgynDBDataReader contains one or more rows.

member.name: P:EsgynDB.Data.EsgynDBDataReader.IsClosed
member.summary: Retrieves a Boolean value that indicates whether the specified EsgynDBDataReader instance has been closed.

member.name: P:EsgynDB.Data.EsgynDBDataReader.RecordsAffected
member.summary: Gets the number of rows changed, inserted, or deleted.

member.name: P:EsgynDB.Data.EsgynDBDataReader.FetchSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of rows to fetch during each network message.

member.name: P:EsgynDB.Data.EsgynDBDataReader.Item(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the value of the specified column in its native format given the column name.
member.returns: The value of the specified column in its native format.

member.name: P:EsgynDB.Data.EsgynDBDataReader.Item(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the value of the specified column in its native format given the column ordinal.
member.returns: The value of the specified column in its native format.

member.name: T:EsgynDB.Data.EsgynDBTransaction
member.summary: Represents a SQL transaction to be made in the database. This class cannot be inherited.

member.name: M:EsgynDB.Data.EsgynDBTransaction.Commit
member.summary: Commits the database transaction.
member.exception: The transaction has already been committed or rolled back. -or- The connection is broken.
An error occurred while trying to commit the transaction.

member.name: P:EsgynDB.Data.EsgynDBTransaction.Connection
member.summary: Gets the EsgynDBConnection object associated with the transaction, or null if the transaction is no longer valid.

member.name: P:EsgynDB.Data.EsgynDBTransaction.IsolationLevel
